Mdisky

An Unofficial Python version of Mdisk API wrapper
Â· Report Bug

---# MdiskyAn Unofficial Python version of Mdisk API wrapper. Used to convert and rename Mdisk Files.## InstallationInstall mdisky with pip```bashpip install mdisky``` To Upgrade```bashpip install --upgrade mdisky``` ## Usage```pythonfrom mdisky import Mdiskimport asyncioasync def main(): mdisk = Mdisk('us5CqX8oandALtQ86FLq') link = await mdisk.convert('https://mdisk.me/convertor/16x9/H331KO') print(link)asyncio.run(main())``````pythonOutput: https://mdisk.me/convertor/16x9/gvh9fI```---## See the [documentation](https://github.com/kevinnadar22/mdisky) for more information about the Mdisk API wrapper.
